page.title: 17Filleigh farms survey
page.content: Most people keep hens. Some keep their eggs and some sell them locally. Some people keep ducks and geese as well. If people own lots of land they sometimes keep horses for riding. The most popular tractors used on the farms in Filleigh are Massey Ferguson, International and Ford. Other types used are John Deere, Fordson, Universal, Lambourghini and Dexta. On some farms computers are used. Some are used for feeding the cows the cake during milking. The cake comes down a chute into a trough for each cow at milking time. The farmer types in the number which is branded on each cow, then the right amount of cake comes down. Some computers are used for dairy management and monthly cash flows.
